gft.api
Interface AccountEventsProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
Session, UserSupport
public interface AccountEventsProvider

The AccountEventsProvider interface represents a source of account-related events.

Implementation of this interface is mandated to be thread-safe.

Author:
Boris Malkin
